trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that is the parent of all page function classes.
trans-unit.target: 抽象基底類別的所有頁面函式類別的父系。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunctionBase"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunctionBase"></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the page function should not be added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否頁面函式不應新增至巡覽記錄。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601.OnReturn%2A> must be called for RemoveFromJournal to be applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601.OnReturn%2A>必須針對要套用的 RemoveFromJournal 呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601.OnReturn%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a page function should not be added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>，指出是否頁面函式不應新增至巡覽記錄。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601> when it is navigated to for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫此方法以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>當巡覽至第一次。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called on the initial navigation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會呼叫在初次巡覽。

trans-unit.source: It is not called if a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601> is later reactivated.
trans-unit.target: 不會呼叫如果<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>稍後重新啟動。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>
